Want to Become A Permanent Cosmetics Artist?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”DM Serif Display|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#000000″ header_3_font_size=”36px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Violet Zherka
Training Academy

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://violetzherka.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/cosmetic-training.jpg” title_text=”cosmetic-training” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.11.1″ animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are a licensed institute with an approved training program by the American Academy of Micropigmentation (AAM), and Violet Zherka is a Certified Permanent Cosmetics Professional of the Society of Permanent Cosmetic Professionals (SPCP). Violet is also a Certified Platinum Trainer with the AAM.

Our Training course follows all the American Academy of Micropigmentations guidelines, which are the highest in the permanent cosmetics industry. The AAM is one of the largest international organizations in the permanent cosmetics industry and one of the only organizations that officially approves permanent cosmetic trainers.

excerpt.rendered: Permanent Cosmetics Clinic Elevate Your Look About UsViolet Zherka Permanent Cosmetics ClinicViolet Zherka is a premier Permanent Cosmetics Clinic and Training Academy. We provide a variety of beauty services that will give you your desired beauty needs. Violet Zherka, a permanent cosmetics Platinum trainer and double board certified in the state of New Jersey, owns […]
